languages.text: {n}Тяжелый вздох вырывается из решетки вокса Вигдис.{/n} "Слушаюсь, Ваша Светлость".
{n}A heavy sigh escapes the grate of Vigdis's vox.{/n} "Yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}Тяжелый вздох вырывается из решетки вокса Вигдис.{/n} "Слушаюсь, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}A heavy sigh escapes the grate of Vigdis's vox.{/n} "Yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: {n}ヴィグディスのヴォクスの格子の部分から重いため息が漏れた。{/n}「了解です、陛下！」
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy sigh escapes the grate of Vigdis's vox.{/n} "Yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィグディスのヴォクスの格子の部分から重いため息が漏れた。{/n}「了解です、陛下！」

languages.text: {n}Vigdis'in voksundan ağır bir iç çekiş duyuluyor.{/n} "Emredersiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy sigh escapes the grate of Vigdis's vox.{/n} "Yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis'in voksundan ağır bir iç çekiş duyulur.{/n} "Emredersiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."

languages.text: {n}Un profundo suspiro escapa de la rejilla del voco de Vigdis.{/n} «Sí, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy sigh escapes the grate of Vigdis's vox.{/n} "Yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un profundo suspiro escapa de la rejilla del voco de Vigdis.{/n} «Sí, mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}维格迪斯的音阵装置中传来了一声沉重的叹息。{/n}“遵命，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy sigh escapes the grate of Vigdis's vox.{/n} "Yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯的音阵装置中传来了一声沉重的叹息。{/n}“遵命，大人。”

languages.text: {n}Un soupir las émane du vox de Vigdis.{/n} « À vos ordres, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy sigh escapes the grate of Vigdis's vox.{/n} "Yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un soupir las émane du vox de Vigdis.{/n} « À vos ordres, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Ein tiefes Seufzen entfährt Vigdis' Vox.{/n} "Ja, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}A heavy sigh escapes the grate of Vigdis's vox.{/n} "Yes, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
